name: MindGym
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mind gym
des: This is a skill to improve your hearing and memory skills. Each session consists of several rounds, in each round you will hear a set of sounds related to some things. You need to identify and say the things in the correct order. This improves your hearing, identification and memory retention. Each successful round adds a new sound to the set. Work hard and try to improve your skills through continuous practice.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
